snippet: Yannick Nézet-Séguin conducted two concerts in the Mostly Mozart Festival, with the Chamber Orchestra of Europe and with the Mostly Mozart Festival Orchestra.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews Mostly Mozart Festival performances by the Chamber Orchestra of Europe and the Mostly Mozart Festival Orchestra, both conducted by Yannick Nezet-Seguin.
lead_paragraph: Yannick Nézet-Séguin conducted two concerts in the Mostly Mozart Festival, with the Chamber Orchestra of Europe and with the Mostly Mozart Festival Orchestra.

headline.seo: Yannick Nézet-Séguin at Mostly Mozart Festival
headline.main: A Quick Visit From a Busy Conductor
headline.print_headline: A Quick Visit From a Busy Conductor
